reason_for_visit: Routine checkup and follow-up on hypertension
notes: Patient is stable, BP controlled with medication.

reason_for_visit: Chest pain, shortness of breath on exertion, and routine follow-up for coronary artery disease
notes: Patient afaq2 reports intermittent chest tightness during exertion lasting 5-10 minutes, relieved by rest. BP mildly elevated at 148/92 mmHg. ECG shows ST-segment depression in leads V4-V6. Echocardiogram reveals mild left ventricular hypertrophy with ejection fraction of 50%. Medications adjusted; beta-blocker dose increased. Advised lifestyle modification including low-sodium diet and cardiac rehabilitation.
